mapper.insert: insert into ec_cust_agent (cust_no, orig_sys_agent_no, agent_devcom_cd, agent_kind, bln_chnl, perf_grade, credit_grade, inwork_date, agent_sts, outwork_date, posit_grade, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origSysAgentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentDevcomCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blnChnl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perfGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inworkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outworkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_cust_agent set agent_devcom_cd = #{agentDevcomCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_kind = #{agentKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bln_chnl = #{blnChnl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perf_grade = #{perfGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_grade = #{creditGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inwork_date = #{inworkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_sts = #{agentSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outwork_date = #{outworkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, posit_grade = #{positGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and orig_sys_agent_no = #{origSysAgentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cust_no, orig_sys_agent_no, agent_devcom_cd, agent_kind, bln_chnl, perf_grade, credit_grade, inwork_date, agent_sts, outwork_date, posit_grade, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_agent

select cust_no, orig_sys_agent_no, agent_devcom_cd, agent_kind, bln_chnl, perf_grade, credit_grade, inwork_date, agent_sts, outwork_date, posit_grade, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_agent where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rec_stat = '0'
and orig_sys_agent_no = #{origSysAgentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
